property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the TrackChangesPreference &#40;a Application).

property.name: events
property.shortdesc: A collection of events.

property.name: eventListeners
property.shortdesc: A collection of event listeners.

property.name: changeBarColor
property.shortdesc: The change bar color, specified as an InCopy UI color. Can return: Array of 3 Reals &#40;0 - 255) or InCopyUIColors enumerator.

property.name: showAddedText
property.shortdesc: If true, displays added text.

property.name: showChangeBars
property.shortdesc: If true, displays change bars,

property.name: showDeletedText
property.shortdesc: If true, displays deleted text.

property.name: showMovedText
property.shortdesc: If true, displays moved text.

property.name: spellCheckDeletedText
property.shortdesc: If true, includes deleted text when using the Spell Check command.

property.name: textColorForAddedText
property.shortdesc: The color for added text, specified as an InCopy UI color. Note: Valid only when added text color choice is change uses change pref color. Can return: Array of 3 Reals &#40;0 - 255) or InCopyUIColors enumerator.

property.name: backgroundColorForAddedText
property.shortdesc: The background color for added text, specified as an InCopy UI color. Note: Valid only when added background color choice is change background uses change pref color. Can return: Array of 3 Reals &#40;0 - 255) or InCopyUIColors enumerator.

property.name: textColorForDeletedText
property.shortdesc: The color for deleted text, specified as an InCopy UI color. Note: Valid only when deleted text color choice is change uses change pref color. Can return: Array of 3 Reals &#40;0 - 255) or InCopyUIColors enumerator.

property.name: backgroundColorForDeletedText
property.shortdesc: The background color for deleted text, specified as an InCopy UI color. Note: Valid only when deleted background color choice is change background uses change pref color. Can return: Array of 3 Reals &#40;0 - 255) or InCopyUIColors enumerator.

property.name: textColorForMovedText
property.shortdesc: The color for moved text, specified as an InCopy UI color. Note: Valid only when moved text color choice is change uses change pref color. Can return: Array of 3 Reals &#40;0 - 255) or InCopyUIColors enumerator.

property.shortdesc: The background color for moved text, specified as an InCopy UI color. Note: Valid only when moved background color choice is change background uses change pref color. Can return: Array of 3 Reals &#40;0 - 255) or InCopyUIColors enumerator.

property.shortdesc: The marking that identifies deleted text.

property.shortdesc: The marking that identifies moved text.

property.name: properties

method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.
